faqs.question: How do I post a job?
faqs.answer: To post a job, go to the 'Post a Job' section in the Lokal app. Fill out job details like title, description, salary, and location. Review the information and click 'Submit'.

faqs.question: What are the charges for posting a job?
faqs.answer: Basic job posting is free. Premium job posting costs Rs. 499, which includes featured placement, highlighted listing, and extended visibility for 30 days.

faqs.question: How can I apply for a job?
faqs.answer: To apply for a job, tap on the job listing you're interested in, review the details, and click the 'Apply Now' button. Follow the instructions to submit your application or contact details.

faqs.question: Can I filter jobs for women only?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can filter jobs for women by using the 'Job Preferences' section. Select 'Jobs for Women' under the special categories filter.

faqs.question: How do I search for jobs in a specific location?
faqs.answer: Use the search bar and enter your city name, or use the location filter to browse jobs in specific areas.

faqs.question: What documents do I need to apply for jobs?
faqs.answer: Typically, you'll need a resume/CV, identity proof (Aadhaar/PAN), address proof, educational certificates, and any skill certifications relevant to the job.

faqs.question: How do I update my job preferences?
faqs.answer: Go to your profile in the Lokal app, select 'Job Preferences', and update your desired job categories, locations, and salary range.

faqs.question: How will I know if an employer responds to my application?
faqs.answer: You'll receive notifications in the app and via SMS when an employer responds to your application or wants to schedule an interview.

faqs.question: Can I save jobs to apply later?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can save jobs by tapping the 'Save' icon on any job listing. Access your saved jobs in the 'Saved Jobs' section of your profile.

faqs.question: How do I delete a job posting?
faqs.answer: To delete a job posting, go to 'My Posted Jobs' in your employer dashboard, find the job listing, and click the 'Delete' or 'Remove' option.
